languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт дарит вам обеспокоенный взгляд.{/n} "Похоже, твоя память ослабла от пагубного влияния контролирующего червя. Ты лично {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_RTSentMarazhaiToArena}вынес{mf||ла} сей приговор{/d}".

{n}Yrliet gives you a concerned look.{/n} "Your memory must have been weakened by the deleterious influence of the controlling worm. You personally {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_RTSentMarazhaiToArena}condemned him{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт дарит вам обеспокоенный взгляд.{/n} "Похоже, твоя память ослабла от пагубного влияния контролирующего червя. Ты лично {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_RTSentMarazhaiToArena}вынес{mf||ла} сей приговор{/d}".

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは不安そうな顔をする。{/n}「あなたの記憶は、きっと制御ワームの悪影響で弱まっているのよ。あなたは個人的に彼を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_RTSentMarazhaiToArena}断罪{/d}したわ」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a concerned look.{/n} "Your memory must have been weakened by the deleterious influence of the controlling worm. You personally {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_RTSentMarazhaiToArena}condemned him{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは不安そうな顔をする。{/n}「あなたの記憶は、きっと制御ワームの悪影響で弱まっているのよ。あなたは個人的に彼を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_RTSentMarazhaiToArena}断罪{/d}したわ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特关切地看着你。{/n}“你的记忆肯定是受到了蠕虫的干扰，是你亲自{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_RTSentMarazhaiToArena}定了他的罪{/d}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a concerned look.{/n} "Your memory must have been weakened by the deleterious influence of the controlling worm. You personally {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_RTSentMarazhaiToArena}condemned him{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特关切地看着你。{/n}“你的记忆肯定是受到了蠕虫的干扰，是你亲自判了他的罪。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet te mira con preocupación.{/n} «Tu memoria debe haberse debilitado por la influencia del gusano controlador. Usted mism{mf|o|a} lo has {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_RTSentMarazhaiToArena}condenado{/d}».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a concerned look.{/n} "Your memory must have been weakened by the deleterious influence of the controlling worm. You personally {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_RTSentMarazhaiToArena}condemned him{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet te mira con preocupación.{/n} «Tu memoria debe haberse debilitado por la influencia del gusano controlador. Usted mism{mf|o|a} lo has condenado».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet wirft dir einen besorgten Blick zu.{/n} "Euer Gedächtnis wurde wohl von dem schädlichen Einfluss des Wurms geschwächt. Ihr habt ihn selbst {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_RTSentMarazhaiToArena}verdammt{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a concerned look.{/n} "Your memory must have been weakened by the deleterious influence of the controlling worm. You personally {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_RTSentMarazhaiToArena}condemned him{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet wirft dir einen besorgten Blick zu.{/n} "Euer Gedächtnis wurde wohl von dem schädlichen Einfluss des Wurms geschwächt. Ihr habt ihn höchstpersönlich verdammt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet vous adresse un regard inquiet.{/n} « Votre mémoire a dû être affaiblie par l'influence délétère du ver. Vous l'avez {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_RTSentMarazhaiToArena}personnellement condamné{/d}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a concerned look.{/n} "Your memory must have been weakened by the deleterious influence of the controlling worm. You personally {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_RTSentMarazhaiToArena}condemned him{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet vous adresse un regard inquiet.{/n} « Votre mémoire a dû être affaiblie par l'influence délétère du ver. Vous l'avez personnellement condamné. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet sana endişeli bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Kontrol solucanının zararlı nüfuzu nedeniyle hafızan zayıflamış olmalı. Onu bizzat sen {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_RTSentMarazhaiToArena}hapse attın{/d}."
